Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Domina Prestige St. Petersburg, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Vladimir Nabokov House Museum and minutes from Museum of the History of Religion. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Blue Bridge and Monument to Nicholas I.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 109 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including a sauna, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in St. Petersburg? This hotel has 915 square feet (85 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel and a ferry terminal shuttle are provided for an additional charge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Domina Prestige St. Petersburg, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, steps from Vladimir Nabokov House Museum and minutes from Museum of the History of Religion. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Blue Bridge and Monument to Nicholas I.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Vladimir Nabokov House Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Museum of the History of Religion - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Blue Bridge - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Monument to Nicholas I - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Mariinsky Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Yusupov Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Manege Central Exhibition Hall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
St. Isaac's Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Russian Vodka Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
State Museum and Exhibition Centre for Photography - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Constitutional Court of Russia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Boris Yeltsin Presidential Library - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Nienschanz Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Bronze Horseman - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Senate Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Domina Prestige St. Petersburg is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 14.9 km / 9.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
